name: h3
description: The 2026 DeMarini CF Drop 11 Fastpitch Softball Bat is crafted for young contact hitters and slappers seeking a lightweight swing and consistent performance. Its Paraflex™ Plus Composite Barrel ensures reliable results and total plate command, making it a favorite among rising travel ball stars and high school players. The bat's Type-V™ Connection minimizes hand-stinging vibrations, allowing young athletes to develop their swings with confidence. With a balanced swing feel and vibrant white, pink, and purple colorway, the CF Drop 11 is designed to enhance bat speed and barrel performance, creating chaos on the field.
